snippet: Duke Energy, the nation’s largest electricity company, said on Tuesday that it would permanently close its Crystal River Nuclear Plant, which has been shut since 2009 after botched repairs.
abstract: Duke Energy will permanently close its Crystal River Nuclear Plant in Florida, which has been shut down since 2009 after botched repairs.
lead_paragraph: Duke Energy, the nation’s largest electricity company, said on Tuesday that it would permanently close its Crystal River Nuclear Plant, which has been shut since 2009 after botched repairs.

headline.main: Florida: Nuclear Plant Will Be Closed Permanently
headline.print_headline: Florida: Nuclear Plant Will Be Closed Permanently
